DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop the electronic management platform for children with epilepsy, establish large data of Chinese children with epilepsy and explore its biological etiology.
DOC.brief_title: Big Data Construction and Biological Etiological Epidemiology Study of Children Epilepsy in China
DOC.detailed_description: The establishment of the electronic management platform for children with epilepsy and large data of epilepsy in Chinese children as well as the epidemiological study its biological etiology.
DOC.criteria: Children with epilepsy diagnosis, seizure types and causes of disease classification in accordance with the International Association for the diagnosis and treatment of epilepsy in 2015 guidelines Epilepsy children Included 014 years old from outpatients and inpatients by the Children's epilepsy specialist using iGrowSys management platform and clinical research, and medical records data entry complete in all China The patients that recorded data is not complete, telephone and communication address unknown The patients that families do not have Internet or children and families will not access the Internet, can not be online operation
